statements: DELETE FROM bar_sales WHERE quantity = 0 AND sale_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM bar_sales WHERE drink_price > 15.00 AND total_sales < 100.00;
DELETE FROM bar_sales WHERE drink_name LIKE '%Mojito%';
DELETE FROM Sales WHERE sale_id = 12345 AND total_amount > 1000.00
DELETE FROM Revenue WHERE (revenue_date < '2022-01-01' OR amount < 500.00) AND source = 'Online Sales'
DELETE FROM Sales WHERE customer_id = 54321 AND product_id = 98765
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com'
DELETE FROM Transaction WHERE bartender_id = 1 AND sale_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Drink WHERE price > 20 AND id IN (SELECT drink_id FROM Transaction WHERE quantity > 10);
DELETE FROM Bar WHERE location = 'New York';
